title: Europe Gets Serious About Women Football , Apart From Money

Energy & Commodities
‘We were expecting better from Barrick,’ analyst says after Newmont calls to fix Nevada Gold Mines
Newmont Corporation has asked Toronto-based Barrick Gold to improve operations at its joint venture before Barrick moves ahead with a planned initial public offering (IPO) later this year.

Trade War
Dominic LeBlanc to lead large trade mission to Mexico next week
The minister in charge of Canada-U.S. trade is leading a large delegation to Mexico next week as Ottawa looks to diversify its trade links in response to Donald Trump’s tariffs and threats.
